channel.title: Mongoose on CyrusN
channel.description: Recent content in Mongoose on CyrusN

item.title: Mongoose.js and MongoDB
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: Custom _id 你schema 有 _id mongo 就唔同你gen, 亦唔可以用 Schema.ObjectId 做ref, 會認唔到type 的 可以令 _id 有意思, e.g. studentSchema, use regno as custom _id e.g. teacherSchema, use teacherInitial as custom _id use uuid if you need to have id before add new stuff e.g. attachmentSchema, need the id to rename the attachment before saving to database. Schema.ObjectId if no need to use custom _id then use Schema.
